text: Approval for a new PTCA catheter line.  The device, as modified, will be marketed under the trade name USCI(R) Telescope(TM) Single Operator Overl-the-Wire Balloon Catheter with Rely(TM) Balloon Material and Hydro/Pel(R) Coating and is indicated for balloon dilatation of the stenotic portion of a coronary artery or bypass graft stenosis for the purpose of improving myocardial perfusion.
